name: Cards Against Friends Online
description:
Play the incredible funny card game Cards Against Friends!

Answer on hilarious question cards with the best card that's available and that makes your friends laugh. You can either submit a prepared card or create a new card with your own answer.

How to play:
Before you can start the game, you have to choose your username, the language you want to play, a time limit and wether you want to have prepared hand cards or create your own.
Then, you will be in the lobby, from where you can send an invitation link to your friends.
At the beginning of every round, there will be a new “selector” (marked with a star).
After at least 3 players are in the game lobby, the selector can start the round.
The other players then need to try to make the selector laugh with their answer on a given question or a phrase before the time runs out.
When all players have answered, the selector needs to look at all answer cards and decide which one was the funniest. After that, the round restarts and the selector changes.

Dark humour and satire is not only permitted, but a must.

If you have any feedback or ideas for improvement, I would really like to read them.
